name: R5-TestScriptOperationCode-R4-TestScriptOperationCode
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 TestScriptOperationCode into FHIR R4

element.display: perform a set of a separate interactions in a single http operation

target.display: Update, create or delete a set of resources as independent actions.

element.display: Get a Capability Statement for the system.

target.display: Get a capability statement for the system.

element.display: Create a new resource with a server assigned id.

target.display: Create a new resource with a server assigned id.

element.display: Retrieve the change history for a particular resource, type of resource, or the entire system.

target.display: Retrieve the change history for a particular resource or resource type.

element.display: Retrieve the change history for a particular resource.
Retrieve the change history for all resources on a system.
Retrieve the change history for all resources of a particular type.
Perform an operation as defined by an OperationDefinition.
Update an existing resource by posting a set of changes to it.

target.display: Patch an existing resource by its id.

element.display: Read the current state of the resource.

target.display: Read the current state of the resource.

element.display: Search a resource type or all resources based on some filter criteria.

target.display: Search based on some filter criteria.

element.display: Search resources in a compartment based on some filter criteria.
Search all resources based on some filter criteria.
Search all resources of the specified type based on some filter criteria.
Update, create or delete a set of resources as a single transaction.

target.display: Update, create or delete a set of resources as a single transaction.

element.display: Update an existing resource by its id (or create it if it is new).

target.display: Update an existing resource by its id.

element.display: Read the state of a specific version of the resource.

target.display: Read the state of a specific version of the resource.
